title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 823.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 823.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part are applicable to all programs
and providers certified, funded or otherwise authorized by the Office who seek
certification or designation by the Office to offer rehabilitative health and
behavioral health services for children/youth as such services are defined in
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
